about_the_game:
Nemesis: Plateau d'Albion is WARNO’s second community-voted Nemesis DLC. The mini-expansion features two new divisions: the crack Soviet VDV troops of 76th Guards Airborne Division and the tenacious French defenders of the 152e Division d’Infanterie.

Reminiscent of the techno-thrillers of the 1980s, in the opening stages of WARNO’s World War III in Europe, the Warsaw Pact plans a spectacular airborne coup de main against the French strategic nuclear missile silos of Base Aérienne 200 on Plateau d'Albion. This is the inspiration for Nemesis: Plateau d'Albion, in which both featured divisions are equipped and manned for a ferocious fight that is not meant to last longer than 20 minutes.

The Warsaw Pact’s 76th Guards Airborne Division and its specially equipped air assault troops have the advantage of surprise, long-range air support, and offensive firepower.

So, too, can the NATO’s 152e Division d’Infanterie field enough weaponry, specialized and reservist infantry, and call in air power to mount a spirited defense.

Nemesis: Plateau d'Albionis a community-voted DLC and features two brand-new WARNO Divisions with a host of new units, weapons, vehicles, and more. Customize your Nemesis battlegroup and take them to war in WARNO’s single-player Skirmish, Ranked, and online Multiplayer.

French 152e Division d’Infanterie


NATO’s French 152e Division d’Infanterie is a reserve division with versatile infantry, heavy air support, and an array of specialized troops and units. With the defense of Base Aérienne 200 being of the utmost importance, RESERVISTE will do the bulk of the fighting, backed by new units such as MARSOUINS naval infantry, heavy-duty GENDARMES DE L’AIR airfield security combat squads, COMMANDOS DE L’AIR special forces, and VIB APCs. Other new units include AML-90 light tanks, RES. EBR 90 armored cars, TRM-10000 LOG heavy supply trucks, M201 jeeps including command version, CERBERE twin 20mm guns and CROTALE SAM systems, and ECUREUIL, ALOUETTE SS-11, and ALOUETTE II PC rotorcraft. The French Armée de l’Air can scramble not only ALPHA JET E in support but also older FOUGA MAGISTER, CM.170 MAGISTER, and CRUSADER fighters. French Aéronavale Naval Aviation brings even more air power to bear with older CRUSADER fighters and SUPER ETENDARD strike fighters.

76th Guards Airborne Division


The daring Warsaw Pact’s Soviet 76th Guards Airborne Division counts on a high proportion of its troops going to battle with light but ‌advanced equipment. The VDV fighting forces are made up of BMD-borne DESANTNIKI and large DESANT. USILENNIE combined squads, with the brand-new BMD-3 acting as a light airborne tank. Other new units include DESANT. LuAZ SNAB. and DESANT. GAZ-66B SNAB supply trucks, the DESANT. LuAZ-967M KOM. command unit, LuAZ 2F62 ZENITCHIK AA unit and DESANT. GAZ-66B ZU-23-2 with its twin guns. Recon is provided by SCHMEL-1 unarmed UAVs, elite DESANT. SPETSRAZVEDKA scouts supported in the field by RAZV. BTR-D. The Soviet Air Forces provide long-range aviation support in the form of newly equipped SU-24M, including one variant with thermobaric bombs, and MIG-31 fighter.

Main Features


  • Command two new WARNO Divisions in Skirmish, Ranked or online Multiplayer: French 152e Division d’Infanterie and the Soviet 76th Guards Airborne Division.
  • Take charge of new units and vehicle models, including French COMMANDOS DE L’AIR special forces, VIB APCs, M201 jeeps, CROTALE SAM systems, and ECUREUIL helicopters, as well as Soviet DESANT. USILENNIE combined squads, BMD-3, and unarmed SCHMEL-1 UAVs.
  • Introducing new units, traits, and weaponry, from SIGINT recon units, artillery Fire Direction command units, to UAVs, and thermobaric air-fuel weapons.

legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
name: WARNO - Nemesis #2 - Plateau d'Albion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Get ready for a ferocious fight with two new divisions of the community-voted Nemesis: Plateau d'Albion. The daring Soviet 76th Guards Airborne Division goes up against the defending French 152e Division d’Infanterie, both featuring a host of new units, vehicles, traits, and unique weapons.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
